1.0.1.name: wordpress/kn-social-slide
1.0.1.description:
• We make setting up a simple slide to your wordpress and lets your visitors know about your facebook, twitter, feedburner email subscriptions and google+ and random post from your own wordpress. Don't worry, you can turn on and off, re-position and re-order any slide you don't want to anytime.

Demo

  • http://www.kakiheboh.com
  • http://www.thegarang.com
  • http://www.kirinselamaperak.com
  • http://www.cikapasaja.com

Customizable

  • Reposition any slide
  • Reorder any slide
  • On and off unwanted slide
  • Auto open for random post
  • Show how many tweet (1 ~ 4)

Feature

  • Facebook Fanpage
  • Twitter Profile
  • Google + Page
